channel.title: EoC now on November 20th
channel.description:
I didn't expect it to be so soon..
http://services.runescape.com/m=news/evolution-of-combat-launches-20th-november
Post your comments, concerns, and thoughts.
I personally think they need to work waaay more on the EoC, its still so flawed in my opinion, and RuneScape has always been small, but frequent updates, and this is a huge overhaul from the old combat system. They also could've just changed the stats of most overpowered weapons and armour, and reduce prayer stats.
EDIT: Funny how EoC is released in [b]13 days[/b]

item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:32, topic:466331”]So today I found out that the Dominion Gloves in the EoC are now top tier weapons. Goliaths are the same as a Chaotic Maul, Spellcasters are the same as a Chaotic Staff, and Swifts are the same as a Royal Crossbow.

In other words, fuck dungeoneering, I have gloves.[/quote]wow really? but how hard will they be to get in eoc

item.title: EoC now on November 20th

item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Just watch.

And then later

Some guy is going to pop out of nowhere then show a video of what seems like a flawless system then alot of hype will build up then a co owner or some shit will release it and much will be revealed about the guy who made the system and show hes a bad bad then when people start downloading it they’ll see its some half assed thing and not even half as good in the video

I don’t know if anyone noticed, but it feels like this story happens every single time, inb4 just me

I think this will take away some players but bring others

I’m not entirely against EoC, but I really do want weapon-specific abilities, or else a lot of things will just be devalued, such as korasis, enhanced Excalibur, dragon claws, and zaniks crossbow. At least the royal crossbow is EXTREMELY useful as the best 2h crossbow in the game.

item.title: EoC now on November 20th
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

I honestly don’t think it’s worth it. People play RS because of the price and how simple it is. If people wanted action bars and abilities, they’d go to WOW or any other MMO.

While they say they’ve ran out of things to do for bosses and combat, I can’t wait to see what they do in the EoC.
I mean, what new things can they add to bosses? Makes them harder, sure. Make you spam buttons to kill them? Looks like they’ve already done that. Then??

To be honest, looks like the perfect update to the year to top it off as the shittiest update year ever.

Read full topic

item.title: EoC now on November 20th
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“mihalich, post:8, topic:466331”][quote author=TTSxClan link=topic=579890.msg4148561#msg4148561 date=1352319814]
No… Just no.
It’s defiantly not ready, nor will it ever be. Runescape has been running just fine, gaining more and more members, improving their old combat, but no their just taking everything and destroying it. They’ve been gaining members, more and more forum guides, everything going great, but now, forums are full of hate and and tutorials on how to end your subscription. Their’s riots on almost every world, People selling all of their items, it’s just chaos. They defiantly should keep the combat now, as it has worked for them for a little over 10 years. Just what I think though.
“We pay, We say.”
[/quote]
Jagex hasn’t’ used the same combat for 10 years and almost everything you just said was a lie.[/quote]They’ve had the same combat system in place but have been adding on for years.

Read full topic

item.title: EoC now on November 20th
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

[quote=“mihalich, post:10, topic:466331”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=579890.msg4148777#msg4148777 date=1352328058]

[quote author=Ashley link=topic=579890.msg4148744#msg4148744 date=1352326435]

so on that day I quit RS after so many years, yay!
[/quote]And your money shall be mine, yay!
[/quote]it was sarcasm lol I won’t quit but I will be more so of a skiller most likely

Don’t be afraid of EOC it actually is quite fun once you get used to it.[/quote]Everyone has there own definition of fun. Im sure you and many others do find it fun but the majority do not. I myself gave the EoC tons of attempts but since I only play the game to do RSB Style warring (One of the only things in current Runescape to actually take skill) I have no reason to play anymore as we can no longer war. The real problem with Runescape isn’t the combat, it is the players. Players choose to do simplistic combat because they like it. They choose not to expose themselves to things like RSB Warring (It takes skill to be able to tank 10-20 people at once) or hybriding or even things im sure I haven’t discovered yet. By forcing them to actually play a combat system that takes skill it is just going to turn them away, it is also going to turn the people who actually do a form of combat in the live game that takes skill away.

Tl;dr Jagex needs to understand it’s not that there game requires no skill, its the players decide to limit themselves with skillless combat because they enjoy it more.

Read full topic
